evidence.claim: Joy Bringers of New Jersey utilizes AWS for cloud services.
The company has implemented HL7 standards in their health tech solutions.
They follow HIPAA regulations in managing patient data.
Integration with X12 transactions is highlighted in their service offerings.
They are partnered with Azure for certain cloud functionalities.

icp.icp_reason: The company focuses on HIPAA compliance and X12 transactions, indicating eligibility for ICP status.
